name: VesTally
description: VesTallyToken(VTT) is a deflationary, self reflecting token. Holders of VTT have exclusive weighted voting rights which will determine the course of action for proposal strategies and charitable initiatives. Weighted blockchain voting gives holders a voice in the development of VTT. Honest liquidity pool distribution, transparent smart contract functionality, rewarding tokenomics, and token governance make VTT unique.
